title: FS: Two SGC 50 T206 Southern Leaguers, McCauley and Otey - Both Cards are Sold
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: FS: Two SGC 50 T206 Southern Leaguers, McCauley and Otey - Both Cards are Sold
posts.post_content:
Hi,

Both cards are sold. Thank you.

I have two T206 Southern Leaguers for sale today, both are graded SGC 50. 

The cards for sale are Pat McCauley and William Otey. The cards are very nice for the grade. The price of each card, delivered and insured, is $200. However, I would prefer to sell both as a lot. So if you want both of them, I will sell them as a pair for $365.

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-3041b.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-3041rb.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-362b.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-362rb.jpg[/IMG]

To buy either or both of these cards, send me an E-mail at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

Thanks.

Cy
[url]www.cyscards.com[/url]
I'll take the McCauley - email sent. Thanks
Hey Cy I'll take the Otey
